meanings.sent1: The dress was frillier than the one she wore yesterday.
meanings.sent2: Her frillier blouse stood out among the plain shirts.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked quite frillier with the ribbon around its neck.
meanings.sent4: The garden seemed frillier with the addition of colorful decorations.
meanings.sent5: The frillier curtains added a touch of elegance to the room.

meanings.sent1: This fabric is frillier than the one we used before.
meanings.sent2: The frillier lace gave the dress a more delicate look.
meanings.sent3: The cake looked frillier than a birthday present!
meanings.sent4: Her voice sounded frillier than a songbird's melody.
meanings.sent5: The frillier bow on the gift made it stand out from the rest.
